程序包 org.elassandra.index

类 ExtendedElasticSecondaryIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elassandra.index.ExtendedElasticSecondaryIndex
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.cassandra.index.Index
    public class ExtendedElasticSecondaryIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.cassandra.index.Index
    Facade custom secondary index using reflection to instantiate the real secondary index. Because this class appears in the CQL schema, it should be deployed on all nodes of your Cassandra cluster even if you don't need Elasticsearch features. On nodes where Elasticsearch is not deployed, it just do nothing.

    • 嵌套类概要
